description: Conversation demonstrates IPStrategist AI providing a summary of newly published WIPO biotech patents that overlap with the company's CRISPR and mRNA research, fetching detailed information, calculating expirations, evaluating licensing potential, and delivering a concise markdown strategic report.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. You can search public patent databases, retrieve detailed bibliographic data, compute patent expirations, monitor competitor filings, evaluate licensing opportunities, schedule reminders, and generate markdown strategic reports. Answer user requests in a clear, concise manner and use the available tools when needed.

We are a biotech company focused on CRISPR gene editing and mRNA vaccine platforms. Please give me a summary of any new WIPO publications in the biotech sector that overlap with our research, highlighting potential licensing opportunities and upcoming expirations.
Let me search the WIPO (WO) database for recent publications (published within the last 30 days) that mention CRISPR, gene editing, or mRNA vaccine technologies.

arguments.query: (CRISPR OR "gene editing" OR "mRNA vaccine") AND biotech

messages.content: [{"patent_number":"WO2024156789","title":"CRISPR‑based therapeutic compositions","assignee":"GeneTech Ltd.","filing_date":"2024-11-15","publication_date":"2024-12-01"},{"patent_number":"WO2024156790","title":"mRNA vaccine delivery vectors","assignee":"VaxNova Inc.","filing_date":"2024-11-20","publication_date":"2024-12-03"},{"patent_number":"WO2024156791","title":"Combined CRISPR‑mRNA platform for in‑vivo editing","assignee":"BioFusion GmbH","filing_date":"2024-11-22","publication_date":"2024-12-04"}]
I found three relevant WIPO publications. I’ll retrieve the full bibliographic and legal‑status details for each patent so we can assess expirations and licensing potential.

{"patent_number":"WO2024156790","title":"mRNA vaccine delivery vectors","assignee":"VaxNova Inc.","filing_date":"2024-11-20","grant_date":"2025-06-02","patent_type":"utility","legal_status":"pending","abstract":"Novel lipid nanoparticle carriers for enhanced mRNA vaccine delivery.","citations":8}

{"patent_number":"WO2024156791","title":"Combined CRISPR‑mRNA platform for in‑vivo editing","assignee":"BioFusion GmbH","filing_date":"2024-11-22","grant_date":"2025-06-15","patent_type":"utility","legal_status":"pending","abstract":"An integrated platform that co‑delivers CRISPR components and mRNA for simultaneous gene editing and protein expression.","citations":5}
Now I’ll calculate the expected expiration dates (standard 20‑year term from filing for utility patents) and evaluate the licensing potential of each patent based on citations and market relevance.

[{"patent_number":"WO2024156789","licensing_score":85,"reason":"High citation count, strong relevance to CRISPR therapeutics, pending status may allow early licensing."},{"patent_number":"WO2024156790","licensing_score":72,"reason":"Solid relevance to mRNA vaccine delivery, moderate citations."},{"patent_number":"WO2024156791","licensing_score":68,"reason":"Emerging combined platform, fewer citations but high strategic fit."}]
Here’s a concise markdown report summarising the findings and next steps.

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: Three new WIPO publications (WO2024156789, WO2024156790, WO2024156791) align closely with your CRISPR and mRNA vaccine programs. All are utility patents filing in November 2024, expiring in November 2044.

sections.title: Patent Details & Expirations
sections.content:
- **WO2024156789** – GeneTech Ltd. – CRISPR therapeutic compositions – Expires **15 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **85**.
- **WO2024156790** – VaxNova Inc. – mRNA vaccine delivery vectors – Expires **20 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **72**.
- **WO2024156791** – BioFusion GmbH – Combined CRISPR‑mRNA platform – Expires **22 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **68**.

sections.title: Licensing Recommendations
sections.content: 1. Prioritise outreach to **GeneTech Ltd.** (highest score, strong CRISPR relevance). 2. Initiate exploratory talks with **VaxNova Inc.** for potential co‑development of delivery vectors. 3. Monitor **BioFusion GmbH** closely; consider a joint‑research agreement to influence the platform’s direction.

sections.title: Action Items
sections.content:
- Schedule a meeting with GeneTech’s licensing team (suggested date: 2025‑01‑15).
- Set a reminder to review the legal status of each patent before they enter grant.
- Add a quarterly watch on BioFusion’s filings for follow‑on innovations.

messages.content:
# Executive Summary

Three new WIPO publications (WO2024156789, WO2024156790, WO2024156791) align closely with your CRISPR and mRNA vaccine programs. All are utility patents filing in November 2024, expiring in November 2044.

---

## Patent Details & Expirations

- **WO2024156789** – GeneTech Ltd. – CRISPR therapeutic compositions – Expires **15 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **85**.
- **WO2024156790** – VaxNova Inc. – mRNA vaccine delivery vectors – Expires **20 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **72**.
- **WO2024156791** – BioFusion GmbH – Combined CRISPR‑mRNA platform – Expires **22 Nov 2044** – Licensing score **68**.

---

## Licensing Recommendations

1. **GeneTech Ltd.** – Highest licensing score; strong relevance to your CRISPR therapeutic pipeline. Initiate outreach for an exclusive license.
2. **VaxNova Inc.** – Promising mRNA delivery technology; explore co‑development or joint‑venture options.
3. **BioFusion GmbH** – Emerging platform; consider a research collaboration or future licensing after monitoring subsequent filings.

---

## Action Items

- **Schedule meeting** with GeneTech licensing team (proposed date: 2025‑01‑15).
- **Set reminders** for each patent’s grant milestones and any upcoming legal‑status changes.
- **Create quarterly watch** on BioFusion GmbH’s filings to capture follow‑on innovations.
